properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1 v8 c1

verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naa Shathruvulu Nanu Chuttinanoo Narakapu Paashamularikattinanoo (2) Varadavale Bhakthiheenulu Porlina (2) Vadalaka Nanu Edabaayani Devaa (2){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Maranaputurulalo Maruvaka Moralida Unnathadurgamai Rakshanasrungamai (2) Thana Aalayamulo Naa Mora Vinenu (2) Adarenu Dharani Bhayakampamuche (2){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naa Deepamunu Veliginchuvaadu Naa Cheekatini Veluguga Cheyunu (2) Jalaraasulanundi Balamaina Chethitho (2) Velupala Cherchina Balamaina Devudu (2){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Pourushamugala Prabhu Kopimpagaa Parvathamula Punaadulu Vanakenu (2) Thana Notanundi Vachchina Agni (2) Dahinchivesenu Vairulanellan (2){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Meghamulapai Aayana Vachchunu Meghamulanu Thana Maatuga Jeyunu (2) Urumula Merupula Menduga Jesi (2) Apajayamichchunu Apavaadikini (2){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Dayagala Vaaripai Daya Choopinchunu Katinulayedala Vikatamu Joopunu (2) Garvishtula Yokka Garvamunanuchunu (2) Sarvamu Nerigina Sarvaadhikaari (2){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naa Kaallanu Ledi Kaalluga Jeyunu Eththaina Sthalamulo Shakthitho Nilipi (2) Rakshana Kedemu Naakandinchi (2) Akshayamuga Thana Pakshamu Jerchina (2){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yehovaa Jeevamugala Devaa Bahugaa Sthuthulaku Arhuda Neeve (2) Anyajanulalo Dhanyatha Choopuchu (2) Hallelooya Sthuthigaanamu Cheseda (2){/lang-eng}
